english: Harmony was the soul of our companionship .
chinese: 和睦可以说是我们友谊的精髓。

english: They are sincere and friendly and happy .
chinese: 他们心地真诚，对人友好，而且和睦。

english: They are sincere and friendly and happy .
chinese: 他们心地真诚，对人友好，幸福和睦。

english: Chinese and hawaiians lived together easily .
chinese: 中国人同夏威夷人相处得很和睦。

english: Be pleasant to each other -- just this once .
chinese: 彼此要和睦些就只为这一次吧。
和睦造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: It was evidently a united and affectionate family .
chinese: 这显然是个和睦恩爱的家庭。

english: She wanted paul and georges always to agree .
chinese: 她要保罗和乔戈斯两个人永远和睦。

english: We must try to get on together .
chinese: 我们必须想办法和睦共处。

english: They were friends again, new, subdued friends .
chinese: 他们又成了朋友，一对和睦的新朋友。

english: All is concord in the woods .
chinese: 森林里一切都和睦相处。

english: I was not satisfied with the conventional unity of marriage .
chinese: 我不满足于通常的和睦婚姻。

english: A cat lived in the greatest friendship with a young sparrow .
chinese: 小猫与小麻雀十分和睦地一起生活。

english: Her relationship with mr. dodds was very amiable, however .
chinese: 但是，她与多兹先生的关系是很和睦的。

english: Three bulls fed in a field together in the greatest peace and amity .
chinese: 三头公牛和睦地一起在地里吃草。

english: It pleases her brother to see us cordial, and that pleases me .
chinese: 她哥哥看见我们和睦就高兴，这也使我高兴。
